description.value:
You quickly assess your prey and apply what you know. As part of the action used to Hunt your Prey, you can attempt a check to Recall Knowledge about your prey. When you critically succeed at identifying your hunted prey with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge], you note a weakness in the creature's defenses in addition to any other benefits. You and allies you tell gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll against that prey. You can give bonuses from Monster Hunter only once per day against a particular creature.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Monster Hunter]
